title: MoparMiningLLC
author: MoparMiningLLC

content: ok in preparation for the holidays and also to clean off my desk of a few extras  I am going to do a raffle with 100 slots and there will be 21 winners. Giveaway items:The list of prizes are as follows:1. ¬† Lightning Koffee - this is 100% columbian coffee and comes from a friend of mine. 2. ¬† Krogothmanhatten 3d printed test coin (has been peeled)3. ¬† VOYR Tangem Wallet4. ¬† VOYR Tangem Wallet5. ¬† VOYR Tangem Wallet6. ¬† VOYR Tangem Wallet7. ¬† VOYR Tangem Wallet8. ¬† Croation Crypto Stamps one ea of V3, V4 and V5 (these have been opened to see which they were but not claimed)9. ¬† Stellar Lumens 3 coin set: Copper Aluminum and Brass10. Litecoin HODL My Beer bottle opener accompanied with a BitSend lighter and bottle opener11. Orange Pills (tic tacs)12. Orange Pills (tic tacs)13. Balletcrypto metallic ice cubes (keep your drink cold without watering it down)14. Balletcrypto REAL Series LTC wallet with engraving on the back ‚Äì ‚ÄúCelebrating ¬†Litecoin‚Äôs Third Halving August 2023‚Äù 15. Bitcoin Trading Cards Genesis Pack (1 pack of 10 cards)16. Bitcoin Trading Cards Genesis Pack (1 pack of 10 cards)17. Acrylic magnetic card holder (will hold and display a business card sized item in a landscape fashion - I used them to display Ballet wallets)18. Acrylic magnetic card holder (will hold and display a business card sized item in a landscape fashion - I used them to display Ballet wallets)19. Lynx Black Monero wallet #27/100 Lynx has them in stock still for $39. This will come with original holograms20. Lynx Black Aion wallet #23/100 Lynx has them in stock still for $39 ea. This will come with original holograms21. Lynx Ethereum DIY wallets Brass and steel set #84/100 The .1 ETH is sold out on their site. Lynx sells their wallets for $39 ea These will come with original hologramsOne slot per person - however, if you have bought something from me in the past 6 months you may have 2 slots. If you have not purchased anything from me in the past 6 months but would like to get a second free slot, please visit any one of my open sales threads and make a purchase:https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5470928.0https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5470735.0https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5474077.0When selecting your slots please list your choices (do review the list of chosen slots and the other comments to insure you pick numbers not already chosen - I will NOT assign random numbers.) Please do not use alt accounts to enter multiple times - if this is identified, you will be disqualified from this raffle and any future raffles. Accounts also need to be registered prior to 1/1/2023 - exceptions would be anyone who has joined and bought from me - their accounts may be newer than 1/1/2023. If any of the rules are confusing, I apologize and you may ask me for clarification here or via DM.Raffle will begin once all slots have been filled. Once all slots have been filled a starting winning block will be selected and we will proceed. I will continue with consecutive blocks until all prizes have been awarded. Each winning number may only win once though a person may win twice if they have 2 slots.Note: all winners will also receive 2 of my MMLLC poker chip DIY wallets with holos.shipping - 1 of 3 options:1. ship direct - winner pays shipping2. hodl for combination with future wins/purchases - no cost for shipping at this time3. hand off to minerjones - no shipping cost with me but will with minerjones when he ships
